Articles.Content:
For certain values of "fly," yes.

False, unless you count the time when PlanetFactory caused many a hell kraken due to being out of date.

The user below me has reached the *ahem* surface of Jool.

False, unless you count the time when PlanetFactory caused many a hell kraken due to being out of date.

My craft became one with Jool.

TRUE!

Nope, a mere 660GTX.

Correct.

Not as far as I know...

The user below me has a YouTube Channel.

No yet, however, I am planning on one - maybe.

The User below Me makes Kopernicus planets.

"Correct!"

Oh wait.. That's not word I'm looking for.. what was it.. ..oh yes, now I remember! "Yes."

Err, I don't think that was right either.. wait a second, that's it! "Right!"

Hmm, now that I think about it, that isn't the word I'm looking for either. Oh well.

The user below me wears a wristwatch.

I just thought of the word! It was "Nope."

Nope, it's broken for 4 years now and never bothered buying a new one

The user below me never played 0,90 or previous versions of KSP

Nope. I've been playing since .22, I think.

True

Yes! the user below me has made an

SSTO.

actually no i tried the demo after i bought the game to see the earlier version of the game.

the user below me like deadmau5

wrong wait? what no!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

yes, but it can get annoying sometimes.

stop NO stop a cant resist fiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiine its me

yes actully how did u know
